Standard configurations

title: RTCPeerConnection: generateCertificate() static method
summary:
The static RTCPeerConnection.generateCertificate()
  function creates an X.509 certificate and corresponding private key, returning a promise
  that resolves with the new RTCCertificate once it's generated.
pageTitle: RTCPeerConnection: generateCertificate() static method - Web APIs | MDN
